attributes.action: Increase inshore fishing limits and grant licenses to UK residents only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unilaterally increase inshore fishing limits to mid-way between Britain and the coast of any other nation. Grant licenses only to UK residents with priority to historic fishing families and use HM Navy to enforce the limits rigorously and to impound any vessel found to be breaching the limits or polluting the sea.
